result.execSummary:
The defendant Rodney J Burrell Sr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Rodney J Burrell Sr is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Rodney J Burrell Sr was found guilty of Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Defendant shall not use/possess drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  Judgment of conviction prepared.
Final pre-trial on September 12, 2014 at 08:45 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Rodney J Burrell Sr
Current: 5 Waunona Woods Ct # 4, Madison, WI 53713   (Effective: 08-04-2014)
Prior: 5825 Russett Rd Apt 2F, Madison, WI 53711

Reporter:  digital recorder - 2:05
  Def waived reading of Information.  Def by Counsel enters a plea of NG.  Motions due w/i 20 days; bail continued.

Defendant in court with Attorney Luis C. Cuevas.  Timothy James Helmberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing signed.
and Notice of DNA and Witness List (Plaintiff's)
Status conference on August 4, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release.
- Defendant shall not possess any type of dangerous weapon.
- Defendant shall not use or possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription.
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $500.00 per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM by 10:00 A.M. on the business day following his/her release from jail.  If the defendant fails to comply with DCBM, a body only bench warrant shall be issued for the defendant's arrest and the defendant shall be held in custody until bail is reviewed by the court.
- Defendant shall be within their residence between the hours of 8 p.m. and 6 a.m.  unless at, or traveling to or from, school, treatment, or employment as approved by BMP in writing.
Defendant waived the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial judge -  Br 5

Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney  State Public Defender.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading.  Defendant stood mute.  Court entered not guilty plea as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for August 4, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
